select.sql: select l.id, l.rekvid, l.kood, l.nimetus, l.muud, l.status, l.library, $2::integer as userid, $1::integer as rekv_id, 'EEL_CONFIG' as doc_type_id from libs.library l where l.library = 'KASSAKONTOD'
select.sqlAsNew: select $1::integer as id , $2::integer as userid, 'EEL_CONFIG' as doc_type_id, null::text as kood, null::integer as rekvid, null::text as nimetus, 'KASSAKONTOD'::text as library, 0::integer as status, null::text as muud

select.sql: select l.id, l.rekvid, l.kood, l.nimetus, l.muud, l.status, l.library, $2::integer as userid, $1::integer as rekv_id, 'EEL_CONFIG' as doc_type_id from libs.library l where l.library = 'KASSAKULUD'
select l.id, l.rekvid, l.kood, l.nimetus, l.muud, l.status, l.library, $2::integer as userid, $1::integer as rekv_id, 'EEL_CONFIG' as doc_type_id from libs.library l where l.library = 'KULUKONTOD'
select l.id, l.rekvid, l.kood, l.nimetus, l.muud, l.status, l.library, $2::integer as userid, $1::integer as rekv_id, 'EEL_CONFIG' as doc_type_id from libs.library l where l.library = 'KASSATULUD'
select l.id, l.rekvid, l.kood, l.nimetus, l.muud, l.status, l.library, $2::integer as userid, $1::integer as rekv_id, 'EEL_CONFIG' as doc_type_id from libs.library l where l.library = 'TULUKONTOD'
